Uses of Package
at.easydiet.view

Packages that use at.easydiet.view
at.easydiet.view This package contains all background classes for the Pivot GUI 
at.easydiet.view.content This package contains all content renderers and bind mappings 
 

Classes in at.easydiet.view used by at.easydiet.view
DietPlanManagementView
          This is the abstract background class for creating and editing a DietPlanBO
DietTreatmentManagementView
          This is the abstract background class for creating and editing a DietTreatmentBO
EasyDietContentView
          Defines the look and feel of the EasyDiet application window content

          Stores all EasyDietContentViewListeners

          Defines the button in the navigation bar

          Stores all EasyDietContentView.NavigationButtons

          Defines the button in the toolbar
EasyDietContentView.ToolbarButtonSequence
          Stores all EasyDietContentView.ToolbarButtons
EasyDietContentViewListener
          Listens to changes in the EasyDietContentView
EasyDietMainWindow
          This is the background class for the startup window.
EasyTableViewRowEditor
          This editor is used to edit tableviews.

EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListenerList
          Row editor listener list.
MealContainer
          This is the Component to store and handle MealBOs
ParameterTableView
          Shows a tableView which handles parameters
ParameterTableViewTemplate
          This is the background class for the ParameterTableViewTemplate.bxml
PatientLikeSheet
          This is the background class to the PatientLikeSheet.bxml.
SimpleButton
          This is a simple button
TimeSpanContainer

TimeSpanContainer.TimeSpanContainerListenerList
          This is the list of all TimeSpanContainerListeners

ViewController
          This controller loads the different views
